meta_data.description: 1815 Sq. Ft. - Rent 4 BHK Apartment / Flat in ATS Rhapsody, Sector 1 Greater Noida West * 25 Property & locality photos * Semifurnished * - 21st floor (out of 29). View contact number for free. Click for complete details on 99acres.com

structured_data.description: Explore this amicable ats rhapsody of sector 1 greater noida west in greater noida ! Live in a 4 bhk flat for rent in sector 1 greater noida west spread over 1815 sq.Ft. This property offers access to nearby landmarks and is close to school, close to hospital and close to mall. This flat consists of 4 bathrooms & more than 3 balconies build in 1815 sq.Ft. Super built-Up area. The flat is built on 1815 sq.Ft. Area. This property has servant room as well. Ease of access to 2 covered parking within society. This flat is situated at 21st in a tower with 29 floors. This is a 0-1 year old society. It is a semi-Furnished property. Inclusive of 25 light, 5 fan, 3 wardrobe, 2 geyser, 1 water purifier, 1 modular kitchen, 1 chimney, 1 curtains and 1 exhaust fan. Ready to occupy from mon, 17 nov 2025, this property is ideal for family on company lease with a notice of 6 months for a duration of 11 months. We are offering this property on  38,000 monthly and is negotiable. Electricity & water charges are not included in rent & to be paid separately.  38000 is required to be paid as the initial payment. Property has been built with latest feature like reserved parking, feng shui / vaastu compliant, piped-Gas, intercom facility, power back-Up, water storage, security / fire alarm, high ceiling height, false ceiling lighting, internet/wi-Fi connectivity, centrally air conditioned, water purifier, recently renovated, natural light, airy rooms and spacious interiors. Swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, shopping centre, cctv surveillance, lift(s), water softening plant, maintenance staff and visitor parking etc. Makes this place stand-Out from rest in terms of quality of living. Other features include rain water harvesting, separate entry for servant room, waste disposal, no open drainage around, bank attached property, low density society, pet friendly, wheelchair friendly and in a gated society. Power backup: Full. This is a north-East-Facing property. Property has a polished concrete flooring.
